title: The Engagement with My True Love Got Cancelled - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Broken Engagement   Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 阿都
description:
'Daughter of the Duke of Colbert, Beatrice. I am breaking my engagement with you.'

It seems that villain girls are meant to be left alone, after all.

I've always liked him, His Highness Charles, since before.
Even if I knew he was just a game character, I still thought of him as someone precious.
Even though I didn't want you to deny this feeling at least.

The reason for breaking the engagement was 'true love.'>
